diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $SA$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $SB$ is $x$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $B$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$ which form a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $SA$, $SB$, $SC$ which connect point $S$ to the vertices of triangle $ABC$.
